name: ReLoaded
description: If you like your games violent, youâ€™re in for a sick treat with Re-Loaded, the sequel to the popular blood-fest shooter Loaded. Re-Loaded is set over a number of 3D levels each more harrowing than the last. The sound effects will have you cringing, and the character animations show each minuscule trait of the six maniacs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Graphics: Dedicated Video Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Not even a port just an emulated version of the old Playstation game (and a bad one at that) compete with Playstation controls, Playstation ERA slowdown and Dodgy Load times. Game equally does not full screen properly.
